capabilities.name: vrchat_get_current_user
capabilities.description: Retrieve your own VRChat user information

capabilities.name: vrchat_send_friend_request
capabilities.description: Send a friend request to another user.

capabilities.name: vrchat_get_friends_list
capabilities.description:
Retrieve a list of VRChat friend information. The following information can be retrieved:
    - "bio"
    - "bioLinks"
    - "currentAvatarImageUrl"
    - "currentAvatarThumbnailImageUrl"
    - "currentAvatarTags"
    - "developerType"
    - "displayName"
    - "fallbackAvatar"
    - "id"
    - "isFriend"
    - "last_platform"
    - "last_login"
    - "profilePicOverride"
    - "pronouns"
    - "status"
    - "statusDescription"
    - "tags"
    - "userIcon"
    - "location"
    - "friendKey"

capabilities.name: vrchat_select_avatar
capabilities.description: Select and switch to a specific avatar by its ID.

capabilities.name: vrchat_search_avatars
capabilities.description: Search and list avatars by query filters. You can only search your own or featured avatars. It is not possible as a normal user to search other people's avatars.

capabilities.name: vrchat_list_favorited_worlds
capabilities.description: List favorited worlds by query filters.

capabilities.name: vrchat_search_worlds
capabilities.description: Search and list worlds by query filters.

capabilities.name: vrchat_get_instance
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific instance. Note: Detailed information about instance members is only available if you are the instance owner.

capabilities.name: vrchat_create_instance
capabilities.description: Create a new instance of a world.

capabilities.name: vrchat_join_group
capabilities.description: Join a VRChat group by ID

capabilities.name: vrchat_search_groups
capabilities.description: Search VRChat groups by name or shortCode

capabilities.name: vrchat_list_favorite_groups
capabilities.description: Returns a list of favorite groups owned by a user.

capabilities.name: vrchat_list_invite_messages
capabilities.description: Returns a list of all the users Invite Messages. Admin Credentials are required to view messages of other users!

capabilities.name: vrchat_request_invite
capabilities.description: Request an invite from a user. IMPORTANT: Always obtain explicit permission from the user before sending an invite request. Note that invite requests cannot be sent to users in private instances. Returns the Notification of type requestInvite that was sent.

capabilities.name: vrchat_get_invite_message
capabilities.description:
Returns a specific invite message. Admin Credentials are required to view messages of other users!

    Message type refers to a different collection of messages:
    - message = Message during a normal invite
    - response = Message when replying to a message
    - request = Message when requesting an invite
    - requestResponse = Message when replying to a request for invite

capabilities.name: vrchat_get_notifications
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of VRChat notifications.
